item.description:
Happy Holidays!!!   I hope everyone is having a wonderful Holiday Season. 

We'll have our next Meet Up on Sunday, January 8th from 11am-1pm.

Those attending for the first time, please be sure to bring proof of vaccinations for rabies, distemper and canine cough.

If anyone would like to have a grooming scheduled for after the meetup, please let me know ahead of time so that I can be sure to have a groomer available.

If anyone needs their little puggies spiffed up for Santa's visit, please give us a call.  We've got plenty of groomers on this Holiday Season to be able to accomodate everyone's needs.  We also still have boarding space available for anyone who needs that.

Wishing you and yours all the best.   Looking forward to seeing everyone!!!

Agni
item.name: January Meet Up
